text: "Auf anderen Wegen" () is a song by German recording artist Andreas Bourani. It was written by Bourani along with Julius Hartog for his second studio album Hey (2014), while production was helmed by Philipp Steinke. ==Formats and track listings== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="center"|Chart (2014) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2014) !Position |- |Germany (Official German Charts) |align="center"|56 |- !Chart (2015) !Position |- |Austria (Ö3 Austria Top 40) |align="center"|34 |- |Germany (Official German Charts) |align="center"|46 |} ==References== Category:2014 singles Category:Andreas Bourani songs Category:2014 songs Category:Universal Music Group singles Category:Songs written by Andreas Bourani
title: Auf anderen Wegen
